MediaStreamTrackMute_event.summary: The mute event is sent to a when the track's source is temporarily unable to provide media data.

remarks.para: When the track is once again able to produce media output, an event is sent.
During the time between the mute event and the unmute event, the value of the track's property is true.

blockquote.para: Note: The condition that most people think of as "muted" (that is, a user-toggled state of silencing a track) is actually managed using the property, for which there are no events.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
